remarks: The topology extractor function depends only on the base and topology components.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jul-2006.)
statement:
topnpropd.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` L ) ) $.
topnpropd.2 $e |- ( ph -> ( TopSet ` K ) = ( TopSet ` L ) ) $.
topnpropd $p |- ( ph -> ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( TopOpen ` L ) ) $.
